pages.text: Wirnpa is an old, steam powered destroyer. It's made mostly of copper, rusted metal and brass, featuring two small cannons and one large cannon.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/missile)$(l)Spikeball/$$(br)Wirnpa $(l)targets a tile/$ and fires a large spikeball at it, $(l)dealing 2 damage to the tile/$. This ability has $(l)2 Use/$ and costs $(l)10 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)$(l)Old But Gold/$$(br)Although the ship is old, it's strong build has stood the test of time just fine, $(l)providing 6 extra tiles/$ for your fleet to use.
pages.title: Passive Ability
